    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void analyseTotalOrders()
      Fuction is used to analyse all orders from the database It loops through all the orders in the database and computes the total revenue, total profit, total basecost, total discount given on membership as a part of overall analysis To look at the growth of the the business across the months, hashmaps are used to store the the revenue, profit and number of orders monthwise ASSUMPTION: This database is only for 1 year (It can be exteneded easily by adding another parameter year as LocalDateTime Class gives us access to the year)
      void appendOrder​(Order order_add)
      Fuction is used to add the orders to the database Implements the appendOrder Function from the DatabaseInterface
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Float> getMonthwiseMembershipDiscount()
      Gets the total membership discount for each month as a HashMap
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Float> getMonthwiseOrders()
      Gets the total orders for each month as a HashMap
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Float> getMonthwiseProfit()
      Gets the profit for each month as a HashMap
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Float> getMonthwiseRevenue()
      Gets the revenue for each month as a HashMap
      Order getOrderInfo​(java.lang.String orderId_input)
      Fuction is used to retrieve the full Order information given the OrderID It searches through all the orders and returns the Order object that matches the given given OrderID
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getOrderstimePeriod​(java.time.LocalDateTime start, java.time.LocalDateTime end)
      Fuction is used to retrieve all orders within a given time period It loops through all the orders in the database and checks whether the timestamp of the order falls in the desired range( start and end )
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getOrderstimePeriodTableId​(java.time.LocalDateTime start, java.time.LocalDateTime end, java.lang.String tableId_input)
      Fuction is used to retrieve all orders from a particular Table within a given time period It uses the above function getOrderstimePeriod to retrieve all the orders within the given time period and then checks all the retrieved strings for the TableID that is the last 3 characters of the OrderID
      float getTotalBaseCost()
      Gets the Total Base Cost of all the orders in the database Total Base cost is the cost price of all the ingredients (Cost Price)
      float getTotalMembershipDiscount()
      Gets the Total Membership Discount for all the orders in the database Total Membership Discount is the total value people have got as a discount
      int getTotalNumelements()
      Fuction is used return the total number of orders in the database Implements the getTotalNumelements Function from the DatabaseInterface
      float getTotalProfit()
      Gets the Total Profit of all the orders in the database Total Profit = Total Revenue - Cost Price(Base Cost)
      float getTotalRevenue()
      Gets the Total Revenue of all the orders in the database

      Fuction is used print all the OrderIds in the database Implements the printDatabase Function from the DatabaseInterface

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Float> getMonthwiseRevenue()
        Gets the revenue for each month as a HashMap
        Returns:
        A HashMap with keys as months(integer 1 to 12) and values representing the total revenue

      • appendOrder

        public void appendOrder​(Order order_add)
        Fuction is used to add the orders to the database Implements the appendOrder Function from the DatabaseInterface
        Specified by:
        appendOrder in interface DatabaseInterface
        Parameters:
        order_add - object of type Order that has all the information about the order including time stamps

      • removeOrder

        public Order removeOrder​(java.lang.String order_id)
        Fuction is used to remove the orders from the database Implements the removeOrder Function from the DatabaseInterface
        Specified by:
        removeOrder in interface DatabaseInterface
        Parameters:
        order_id - of type String is used to find the unique order from the order database
        Returns:
        Order Object of the Food to be removed

      • analyseTotalOrders

        public void analyseTotalOrders()
        Fuction is used to analyse all orders from the database It loops through all the orders in the database and computes the total revenue, total profit, total basecost, total discount given on membership as a part of overall analysis To look at the growth of the the business across the months, hashmaps are used to store the the revenue, profit and number of orders monthwise ASSUMPTION: This database is only for 1 year (It can be exteneded easily by adding another parameter year as LocalDateTime Class gives us access to the year)

      • getOrderstimePeriod

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getOrderstimePeriod​(java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                                                 java.time.LocalDateTime end)
        Fuction is used to retrieve all orders within a given time period It loops through all the orders in the database and checks whether the timestamp of the order falls in the desired range( start and end )
        Parameters:
        start - of the type LocalDateTime represents the start of the desired time period
        end - of the type LocalDateTime represents the end of the desired time period
        Returns:
        A sorted array list of all the orderIds that fall within the desired time period

      • getOrderstimePeriodTableId

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getOrderstimePeriodTableId​(java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                                                        java.time.LocalDateTime end,
                                                                        java.lang.String tableId_input)
        Fuction is used to retrieve all orders from a particular Table within a given time period It uses the above function getOrderstimePeriod to retrieve all the orders within the given time period and then checks all the retrieved strings for the TableID that is the last 3 characters of the OrderID
        Parameters:
        start - of the type LocalDateTime represents the start of the desired time period
        end - of the type LocalDateTime represents the end of the desired time period
        tableId_input - of the type String represents the table for which you want to retrieve orders
        Returns:
        A sorted array list of all the orderIds that fall within the desired time period belonging to the given tableID

      • getOrderInfo

        public Order getOrderInfo​(java.lang.String orderId_input)
        Fuction is used to retrieve the full Order information given the OrderID It searches through all the orders and returns the Order object that matches the given given OrderID
        Specified by:
        getOrderInfo in interface DatabaseInterface
        Parameters:
        orderId_input - of the type String represents the unique OrderID to be searched for in the database
        Returns:
        An object of the type Order that matches with the input OrderID Implements the getOrderInfo Function from the DatabaseInterface

      • sort_ids

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sort_ids​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> orderIds_input_sort)
        Fuction is used to sort all the strings It sorts the given arraylist of strings using the sort function from Collections class
        Parameters:
        orderIds_input_sort - is an arraylist containing all the strings(OrderIds)
        Returns:
        A sorted arraylist
